summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 RANGER CF5000. WHILE DRIVING 60 MPH THE TRAILER PIN THAT HOLDS THE BRAKE CALIPER SEPARATED FROM THE BACKING PLATE CAUSING THE BRAKE CALIPER TO LOOSEN.  THE DEALER STATED THE MOUNTING THREADS FOR THE PIN ARE INADEQUATE AND THAT THE MANUFACTURER WOULD ONLY REPLACE THE PINS AND THE BACKING PLATE WHEN THERE WAS A FAILURE.  THE VEHICLE DOES NOT HAVE AN ODOMETER.
